sentence: Let's show them we're NOT backing down: https://t.co/4OXYM6kWP5 pic.twitter.com/o6xQ538lJz Mandela Barnes (@TheOtherMandela) December 20, 2021
title: The way forward is to view Manchin and Sinema as opportunities not just as obstacles

sentence: MADISON, Wis. (AP) - Former Democratic state Rep. Mandela Barnes said Wednesday in launching his campaign for lieutenant governor that he wasn't asking for voter support just because I'm young and black.? But Barnes, a 31-year-old African-American from Milwaukee, said Democrats need to do a better job connecting with people of color and young voters.
author: SCOTT BAUER
title: Former state Rep. Barnes running for lieutenant governor
